title: 1.2 Master Challenge 1
question:
Create a document on Google Docs on the topic The Impact of Social Media on Our Lives.
1. Share it with your team members (a group of five) via a link.
2. Ask them to contribute some points regarding the topic in the same document via co-editing, in the same time frame.
3. Ask for constructive feedback from your team members regarding your work via comments. Use the tagging feature to tag your fellow members.
4. Add a bookmark to the document to allow the team members to view the specific location of the article
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
